php.LBL_ENABLE/DISABLE_MESSGAE: Click on value to enable/disable it. Then click save
php.LBL_SELECTED_VALUES_MESSGAE: will appear for the user with this Role
php.LBL_CLOSES_RECORD: Is the record supposed to be blocked?
php.LBL_BLOCKED_RECORD_INFO: Selecting this option will prevent the record from being edited. If you want to unblock the record you have to accept the assigned permissions in the profile
php.LBL_RECORD_STATE_INFO: This value might be taken into account in some record state mechanisms
php.LBL_TIME_COUNTING_INFO: You can group several statuses into categories in which the system summarizes the times of these statuses. The system can then perform some action when the time is exceeded.
php.LBL_IS_NOT_A_PROCESS_STATUS_FIELD: Field is not a process status field.
php.LBL_CONFIRM_BEFORE_MODIFY: The selected field is interdependent with other modules: %s. Are you sure you want to proceed?
php.LBL_CSV_DESC: Import csv file with each value per line
